author: kdlong
body:
#### PR description:

Fix divide by zero that happens in PFCandConnector when PFCands formed from a poor displaced track are "ghosted."
* Add explicit check that energy is > 0
* Modify rescaleMomentum function to only scale three momentum, to avoid modifying the mass (and to avoid zero energy particles)

#### PR validation:

Have tested in PFValidation that no changes are seen for most events. Also confirmed that the nan events are fixed for the files reported in #39110
title: Pf cand rescale
